description:
Hat, neck gaiter, or mask, no matter how you wear you neck tube, you’ll be cozy. Made from a soft and stretchy recycled microfibre, these printed neck tubes bring a little colour, and a lot of warmth, to grey winter days.

  • Repreve® recycled polyester is quick drying, wicking, and made from plastic bottles
  • Gives new life to 6 recycled plastic bottles
  • Seamless construction for added comfort
  • UPF 50+ blocks more than 98% of harsh UV
name: Bula Double Printed Neck Tube - Unisex
